name: Sweet and Sour Chicken
ingredients: 4 chicken breasts (cut up into large bite size pieces)
steps: *mix together in a bowl or bag
In a bowl beat 2 eggs. Dip chicken in eggs and then in the dry mixture.
Saute 1 large onion in large sauce pan/skillet with olive oil and then place the chicken in the pan and brown
them. Pour chicken and onions in a 9x13 baking pan. Set aside.
Pour sauce over chicken and cover with foil. Place in oven at 350 for 1 hour. Serve over rice.
